articles.author: By Kate Pickles, Health Correspondent For The Daily Mail
articles.title: Coronavirus UK: Over 1m a day to be tested in 'megalabs' by 2021 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The mass-testing sites, based in Leamington Spa and Scotland, will each be capable of processing 300,000 tests a day. Pictured: Mr Hancock last week.
